Cheesecake

Package cheesecake :: Module codeparser :: Class CodeParser
[hide private]
[frames] | no frames]

Class CodeParser
source code

object --+
         |
        CodeParser

Information about the structure of a Python module.

  • Collects modules, classes, methods, functions and associated docstrings
  • Based on mwh's docextractor.model module

Return list of functions called by functions/methods defined in this module.
